price: 152. qui sèment la corruption sur terre et n’appellent pas à la réforme. »
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
